title: 🎨 Support – Thank you for using our app
content:
Thank you for using our app!

Our apps are created by parents to inspire creativity and confidence in young children through drawing, coloring, and simple puzzles.

🛠️ Need Help?

If you're experiencing any issues, please reach out — we'd be happy to help!

📧 Email: dentin-97.aniline@icloud.com

❓ Common Questions

Q: Does the app collect any data?
A: No. Our apps do not collect or store any personal data. There are no accounts, no ads, and no tracking.

Q: Does it work offline?
A: Yes! Everything is fully local — perfect for car rides, flights, or quiet time.

Q: What age is it for?
A: The apps are designed for kids aged 2–6, with a simple, kid-safe interface.

🔄 App Version

This support page covers all our apps.
You can check your app version in the App Store or within the app settings.
